thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 16 of 189
thread.title: Dyanne Reed

author: Dyanne Reed
title: Dyanne Reed
text: I signed up to use a free trial and found this site easy to use. I greatly appreciate the extension on cancelling my free trial. I was a few hrs past the cancellation time and the charge had already gone through but Eric was kind enough to reverse the charge. I plan to use this site later this year but I wanted to see how it worked prior to confirming my subscription. I will recommend this site to friends and family.
